title: The judgment of an anonymous writer concerning ... I. a law for disabling a papist to inherit the crown, II. the execution of penal laws against Protestant dissenters, III. a bill of comprehension : all briefly discussed in a letter sent from beyond the seas to a dissenter ten years ago.
author: Hickes, George, 1642-1715.
publisher: Printed by T.B. for Robert Clavel and are to be sold by Randolph Taylor ...,
